title: Corrections & Amplifications
body:
In some editions Friday, the headline with a U.S. News article about Federal Reserve governor Lael Brainard misspelled her surname as Brainerd.
Googleâ€™s Nest Renew tool is intended to let people adjust the timing of their energy consumption to use more electricity when more renewable energy is available. A Business News article on Thursday about the Nest smart thermostat could have been interpreted to mean users would be able to switch between renewable and nonrenewable sources of electricity.
